# Surya Narayan — Indie Hacker & Full-Stack Developer

> Personal portfolio and blog of Surya Narayan, an indie hacker and full-stack developer building SaaS products. Specializing in React, Node.js, and AI-powered solutions.

## About Surya Narayan

Surya Narayan is an indie hacker and full-stack developer based in India. He builds SaaS products that solve real problems, with a focus on execution over theory. He is the creator of ProofEdge (a social proof SaaS platform) and NovaNews (an AI-powered news aggregator). He specializes in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and AI integration. He believes in building in public, learning by doing, and using AI as leverage for faster execution.

### Your Website Is Lying to Every Visitor Who Lands on It
- **URL**: https://surya.viilasa.com/blogs/your-website-is-lying-to-every-visitor
- **Date**: February 19, 2026
- **Summary**: Most websites lose visitors in 8 seconds because they lack social proof. This article explores the psychology behind trust signals, the 5 types of social proof that actually convert, and why real-time social proof widgets like ProofEdge create a compounding trust flywheel.
- **Key Insight**: "Social proof is not a section. It's a layer. It needs to be woven into the experience from the first second to the last click."
